item.title: Lab I: Setup Blog
item.description: Successfully set my first Hugo blog, by following https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ Link to my blog https://winsa24.github.io/ Need to learn Markdown grammar Notes: Ways to update the pages: Git command as follow: rm -rf docs (optional) Hugo git add . git commit -m â€œsomething" git push origin master
